text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
"I have finished spectating the race, and<n>have
now arrived at the nearest train<n>station."
...Message sent.

text_block_list.name: International Reporter
text_block_list.text:
Oh, howdy, young lady! I'm a race<n>reporter from
halfway 'cross the world!<n>Mind if I get a few pics
of ya for the<n>news?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I have no plans at the moment... That is<n>to say, "a
few pics" are okay.

text_block_list.name: International Reporter
text_block_list.text:
Yeehaw! These'll charm the papers back<n>home!
Now you have a good one, Miss<n>Mihono
Barbin! â™ª

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...My name is Mihono Bourbon. It isspelled M-I-H-O-N-O B-O-U-R-B-O-N...

text_block_list.name: Platform Announcement
text_block_list.text:
The limited express train at platform one<n>will be
departing shortly. Please stand<n>behind the yellow
line.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Analyzing situation. The reporter has<n>boarded the
express train. Attempted<n>correction failed. High
risk of my name<n>being printed incorrectly
worldwide.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
No other train will catch up in time.<n>However, my
maximum speed exceeds<n>that of the express.
Engaging run.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant... Correction complete.Fatigue from... unexpected exercise...detected.

Mihono Bourbon successfully points out<n>the
mistake to the reporter, but now<n>she's left utterly
exhausted.
